messages.title: Tories: A change Wallasey canâ€™t afford

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The NHS has been transformed under Labour with continued investments.
Building new schools and better futures.
The Pension Credit, Winter Fuel Payments, free TV licences for the over 75s, and a free bus pass.
An end to regeneration and millions of investment in New Brighton withdrawn under Tory plans to scrap Regional Development Agencies.
Sure Start Children's Centres are a thing of the past after the Tories said they would cut them by a third.

issues.education: Building new schools and better futures.
issues.health: The NHS has been transformed under Labour with continued investments.
issues.socialWelfare: The Pension Credit, Winter Fuel Payments.

housing.content: An end to regeneration and millions of investment in New Brighton withdrawn under Tory plans.

quotes.text: Only Labour or the Tories can win here for a fairer future.

images.caption: Images of Angela Eagle with local constituents and highlighting Labour's support for the NHS, schools, pensioners, regeneration, families, and police.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Contrasts Labour's achievements with the consequences of a Tory government.
